import React, { useState } from "react"; import "./payment.css"; // Link to the CSS file for styling const PaymentPage = () => { const [selectedPaymentMethod, setSelectedPaymentMethod] = useState("Wallet"); const paymentMethods = [ { id: "Wallet", name: "Wallet", icon: "/images/wallet.png" }, { id: "MaestroCard", name: "MaestroCard", icon: "/images/maestro-card.png" }, { id: "PayPal", name: "PayPal", icon: "/images/paypal.png" }, { id: "Stripe", name: "Stripe", icon: "/images/stripe.png" }, ]; const handlePaymentSelection = (method) => { setSelectedPaymentMethod(method); }; const handleProceedPayment = () => { alert(`Proceeding with ${selectedPaymentMethod}`); }; return (
{/* Back Arrow and Heading */}

Choose Payment Method

{/* Items Section */}

Royal Cheese Burger

1x item

₹120

Potato Veggies

1x item

₹70

Coke Coca Cola

1x item

₹40

{/* Summary and Payment Methods Section */}
Delivery Address

45, Green Street, Sector 12...

Items ₹230

Sales Tax ₹10

Subtotal (3 items) ₹240

Select Payment Method

{paymentMethods.map((method) => (
handlePaymentSelection(method.id)} > {method.name}
))}
+ Add New Card
); }; export default PaymentPage;
